EmailTemplate.subject: URGENT: Missing Information on Your {!litify_pm__Intake__c.Case_Type_Name_del__c} Case - Immediate Action Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope this message finds you well. We at Saddle Rock Legal Group, the law firm representing you in your {!litify_pm__Intake__c.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case, are urgently trying to get in touch with you. We have been attempting to reach you for some time now regarding crucial missing information in your file. If we do not receive a response from you immediately, we will have no choice but to reject your claim, which will prevent you from receiving a potential settlement.
We cannot stress enough the importance of your prompt response. Please call us back at {!Organization.Phone} as soon as possible, as this will only take 5-10 minutes of your time. Remember that time is of the essence in this matter, and any delay could severely impact the outcome of your case.
Thank you for your cooperation.
Best regards, Saddle Rock Legal Group Office: {!Organization.Phone}
